data.name: CHIPTUNE PACK: Games & Videos
data.detailed_description:
Feature List

Instant Jingles & Fx - Chiptune

All jingles, sound and music pieces are authentic and were composed for instant use. If you aim for retro vibe for your game, stream, advertisement or trailer, you can't go wrong with this content.

120 Ready-made Fx Sounds

  • shots
  • hits
  • switches
  • steps
  • beeps
  • noises
  • scratches
  • explosions
....and More

60 Jingles

  • win
  • lose
  • get ready
  • game over
  • surprise
  • bonuses
  • powerups
....and More

100 Music Pieces

  • positive
  • negative
  • dramatic
  • danger
  • happy
  • neutral
  • rhythmic
  • atmospheric
  • fast
  • slow
....and More


Copyright & Licensing Terms

You are welcome to use all the content in this DLC for commercial use in your games, videos, advertisements, just anything. Please don't resell our content and credit us as follows:

http://rytmikultimate.com/chiptunepack

Copyright


The copyright to all CINEMAX, s.r.o. content always remains with us, regardless of what you use it for or what type of licence it is used under. ​

All our content is composed exclusively by us, CINEMAX, s.r.o. You cannot state that you own our content, or that anyone else owns it, or that you or anyone else has the rights to use it, or that you composed it and/or performed it.

You cannot make our content available for download or tell others that they can do so. You cannot resell it in any form, or tell others that they can do so. You cannot redistribute it in any form aside from its part in your production.

Licensing Terms


All the content of this DLC is licensed under the terms of a Creative Commons Attribution License 3.0.


About the Game

Imagine you have a rich set of sounds, jingles and music pieces within reach which you can use in your games, music videos, trailers, advertisements or your streams. Royalty free. Available inside a robust music software. Chiptune Pack for Rytmik Ultimate is precisely like this.

This DLC for Rytmik Ultimate is offering hundreds of jingles, sounds and music pieces instantly usable in your games and videos. You can access all this content through three tracks included in this DLC.

  • The first track offers ready-made sound effect perfect for any arcade game or retro styled animation. (120 Ready-made Fx Sounds)
  • The second track is all about jingles. Do you need win, loose or death sound? We are ready for this. (60 Jingles)
  • The third track offers short music pieces with various kinds of moods. Positive, negative, happy, fast, slow, atmospheric - we got all your needs covered. (100 Music Pieces)

Everything we are offering you is based on instrumental chiptune bank which is an integral part of Rytmik Ultimate. You can use jingle, music piece or sound effect as you like without or with further modification. We don’t care as long as your players and viewers are happy. But to be honest, we hope you play with our presets and create and share your creations with the community. It’s straightforward and fun to create something unique and original.
data.about_the_game:
Imagine you have a rich set of sounds, jingles and music pieces within reach which you can use in your games, music videos, trailers, advertisements or your streams. Royalty free. Available inside a robust music software. Chiptune Pack for Rytmik Ultimate is precisely like this.

This DLC for Rytmik Ultimate is offering hundreds of jingles, sounds and music pieces instantly usable in your games and videos. You can access all this content through three tracks included in this DLC.

  • The first track offers ready-made sound effect perfect for any arcade game or retro styled animation. (120 Ready-made Fx Sounds)
  • The second track is all about jingles. Do you need win, loose or death sound? We are ready for this. (60 Jingles)
  • The third track offers short music pieces with various kinds of moods. Positive, negative, happy, fast, slow, atmospheric - we got all your needs covered. (100 Music Pieces)

Everything we are offering you is based on instrumental chiptune bank which is an integral part of Rytmik Ultimate. You can use jingle, music piece or sound effect as you like without or with further modification. We don’t care as long as your players and viewers are happy. But to be honest, we hope you play with our presets and create and share your creations with the community. It’s straightforward and fun to create something unique and original.
data.short_description: This DLC for Rytmik Ultimate is offering hundreds of jingles, sounds and music pieces instantly usable in your games, videos and soundtracks.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows Vista/7/8/10
  • Processor: Single Core 1.6 GHz
  • Memory: 1024 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 3D graphics card supporting DirectX with 64 MB of memory
  • Sound Card: A compatible sound card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows Vista/7/8/10
  • Processor: Dual Core 2.0 GHz
  • Memory: 2048 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 3D graphics card supporting DirectX with 64 MB of memory
  • Sound Card: A compatible sound card
